mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member (member_name, member_email, member_requiredterm, member_optionalterm) VALUES (#{memberName}, #{memberEmail}, #{memberRequiredTerm}, #{memberOptionalTerm})
mapper.select: SELECT c.challenge_no AS challengeNo, c.challenge_intro AS challengeShortIntro, c.challenge_title AS challengeTitle FROM MEMBER m INNER JOIN CHALLENGE c ON m.challenge_no = c.challenge_no WHERE m.member_id = #{memberId}::UUID

SELECT c2.challenge_no AS challengeNo, c2.challenge_intro AS challengeShortIntro, c2.challenge_title AS challengeTitle FROM MEMBER m INNER JOIN CHALLENGE c1 ON m.challenge_no = c1.challenge_no INNER JOIN CHALLENGE c2 ON c1.challenge_group = c2.challenge_group WHERE m.member_id = #{memberId}::UUID AND c2.challenge_no > c1.challenge_no ORDER BY c2.challenge_no ASC

SELECT c2.challenge_no AS challengeNo, c2.challenge_intro AS challengeShortIntro, c2.challenge_title AS challengeTitle FROM MEMBER m INNER JOIN CHALLENGE c1 ON m.challenge_no = c1.challenge_no INNER JOIN CHALLENGE c2 ON c1.challenge_group = c2.challenge_group WHERE m.member_id = #{memberId}::UUID AND c1.challenge_no > c2.challenge_no ORDER BY c2.challenge_no ASC

SELECT m.mission_title, m.mission_explain FROM mission AS m WHERE m.challenge_no = 1 AND m.mission_no NOT IN ( SELECT c.mission_no FROM member AS mem INNER JOIN complete AS c ON mem.member_no = c.member_no WHERE mem.member_id = #{memberId}::UUID )
